column1: Badessa is a town and separate woreda in eastern Ethiopia. Located in the West Hararghe Zone of the Oromia Region
column2: at the base of a spur of the Chercher Mountains 40 km south of the Addis Ababa - Djibouti Railway and 65 km east of Awash
column3: this town has a latitude and longitude of 8°54′N 40°47′E with an elevation of 1761 m above sea level.
